name: MAJESTIC SPOT ATOP CAPE TOWN MOUNTAIN- hike, swim, picnic with Bandile
description:
Silver
Mine Reservoir/Dam and the surrounding mountains were included as a part of the
Table Mountain Range in 1998.  Table
Mountain, which is one of the world’s seven natural wonders, and its range of
mountains with one of the most diverse set of flora in the world are protected
by Table Mountain National Park.  I
invite you to come and join me as we explore some of Cape Town’s natural beauty
